channel.title: SQL on Srujan Jabbireddy
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Srujan Jabbireddy

item.title: Anomaly Detection in Electricity Usage
item.description: Build a practical rule-based machine learning model to identify anomalies in electric consumption Using new extracted features from electric data, built a boosting models(XGBoost and Isolation Forest) that predicts consumption values for each day. Detected several anomaly patterns across the time-series data of 4 years with an accuracy of 0.7 For more of my insights
